Introduction.Name: Orcs and Goblins
Introduction.Description: The Greenskins are a highly primitive and warlike race of bestial humanoid barbarians and raiders that occupy much of the Eastern Hemisphere of the Warhammer World. The term "Greenskins" is a common collective description used by many civilised nations to refer to the forces of the Orcs and Goblins and other biologically related races. The broadest division is between the Orcs, who are strong, brutish, and savage warriors, and the Goblins, who are smaller and weaker, but cunning and conniving creatures.||The Greenskins are considered by many to be the scourge of all civilisation. These tribal warriors are extremely violent, raiding ceaselessly, carrying war and barbarism to all corners of the known world. Time and again, hordes of Greenskins would arise without warning and lay a great swath of destruction that has no direction or purpose other than simple violence. Indeed, the Greenskin race's single motive is violence, an ever increasing mass of warfare that has the potential to dominate and cover the entire world in a seething green tide.

Artefact.Name: Sword of Striking
Artefact.Description: +1 to Hit

Artefact.Name: Sword of Battle
Artefact.Description: +1 Attack

Artefact.Name: Sword of Might
Artefact.Description: +1 Strength

Artefact.Name: Biting Blade
Artefact.Description: -1 armour save

Artefact.Name: Enchanted shield
Artefact.Description: 5+ armour save

Artefact.Name: Talisman of Protection
Artefact.Description: 6+ Ward save

Artefact.Name: Dispell Scroll
Artefact.Description: Automatically dispel an enemy spell, one use only

Artefact.Name: Power Stone
Artefact.Description: +2 dice to cast a spell

Artefact.Name: Staff of Sorcery
Artefact.SpecialRule: +1 to dispel
Artefact.Description: +1 to dispel

Artefact.Name: War Banner
Artefact.Description: +1 Combat Resolution

Artefact.Name: WAAAGH! Cleava
Artefact.Description: All hits from this weapons wound automatically and allow no armour saves

Artefact.Name: Battleaxe of the Last WAAAGH!
Artefact.SpecialRule: Attacks and Strength bonus equal rank bonus
Artefact.Description: The wielder of this weapon receives a bonus equal to his unit's rank bonus to both his Attacks and Strength - calculate this when the wielder makes his attacks

Artefact.Name: Basha's Bloodaxe
Artefact.Description: Grants +1 Strength in the first round of combat. The wielder of this weapon is subject to Frenzy (D6 extra attacks). The wielder can never lose his Frenzy

Artefact.Name: Shaga's Screamin' sword
Artefact.SpecialRule: +1 Strength and +1 Attack for each enemy character within 12"
Artefact.Description: The wielder receives +1 Strength and +1 Attack for each enemy character within 12"

Artefact.Name: Skull wand of Kaloth
Artefact.Description: For each successful hit inflicted by this weapon, the victim must pass a Leadership test or be slain instantly. No armour, ward or regeneration saves are allowed against this special attack. If the tests are passed, roll to Wound and save as normal. Only for shamans

Artefact.Name: Porko's Pigstikka
Artefact.SpecialRule: Additional attack for each pointt of rank bonus
Artefact.Description: Spear. On the turn the wielder charges, he receives an additional attack for each point of rank bonus that the unit hi is attacking has (up to a maximum of +3)

Artefact.Name: Ulag's Akrit axe
Artefact.Description: The wielder may re-roll any missed to hit rolls. It also grants +1 Strength in the first round of combat

Artefact.Name: Backstabber's blade
Artefact.SpecialRule: +1 Strength flank attack bonus
+2 Strength rear attack bonus
Artefact.Description: Grants poisoned attacks. Grants the wielder +1 Strength if he is attacking the enemy in the flank and +2 Strength if he is attacking them in the rear

Artefact.Name: Wollopa's One Hit Wunda
Artefact.SpecialRule: Strength 10 for one combat phase
Artefact.Description: Once per game, this weapon grants the wielder Strength 10 for duration of the combat phase. One use only

Artefact.Name: Mortog's best Basha
Artefact.Description: The wielder of this blafe gains +1 Wepon Skill, +1 Strength and +1 Initiative

Artefact.Name: Sneaky Skewerer
Artefact.Description: Wounds caused by this weapon suffer an additional -3 armour save modifier

Artefact.Name: Lucky's Dirk
Artefact.SpecialRule: +1 Strength for each enemy magic item
Artefact.Description: If the bearer strikes an enemy character carrying one or more magic item, his hits at +1 Strength for each magic item

Artefact.Name: Armour of Gork
Artefact.Description: Light armour. The wearer has +1 Toughness

Artefact.Name: Spliteful shield
Artefact.SpecialRule: Strength 5 hit for each 1 on a enemy roll to Hit
Artefact.Description: Shield. Any foe that rolls a 1 when attempting to strike the bearer in close combat suffers a Strength 5 hit for each such roll

Artefact.Name: Effigy of Mork
Artefact.Description: All close combat attacks made against the bearer suffer -1 to Hit

Artefact.Name: Warboss Umm's Best Boss 'at
Artefact.Description: Grants the rearer a 5+ Ward save

Artefact.Name: Amulet of Protectyness
Artefact.SpecialRule: When the bearer of this amulet is wounded, he counts as having the save armour as the model that caused the wounds
Artefact.Description: When the bearer of this amulet is wounded, he counts as having the save armour as the model that caused the wounds

Artefact.Name: The Collar of Zorga
Artefact.SpecialRule: Steeds and monsters require Strength 6 to hit the bearer
Artefact.Description: Steeds, monsters (ridden and unridden) and beasts pulling chariots require 6S to hit the bearer

Artefact.Name: Idol of Mork
Artefact.SpecialRule: +1 Power dice for each Orc unit within 24"
-1 Power dice for each fleeing frendly unit within 24"
Artefact.Description: +1 Power dice for each Orc unit within 24"|-1 Power dice for each fleeing frendly unit within 24"

Artefact.Name: Staff of Sneaky Stealin'
Artefact.SpecialRule: Steals 1 Power dice from the enemy to dispel
Artefact.Description: At the start of each of your opponent's magic phases, you may take one dice from you opponent's power poll and add it to your dispel poll

Artefact.Name: Staff of Baduumm
Artefact.SpecialRule: +1 to any casting attempts
Artefact.Description: Adds +1 to any casting attempts made by the bearer

Artefact.Name: WAAAGH! paints
Artefact.SpecialRule: +2 to any casting attemts in close combat
Artefact.Description: If the Shaman is in combat at the start of the Orcs and Goblins magic phase, he receives +2 to any casting attempts

Artefact.Name: Magic mushrooms
Artefact.SpecialRule: +D6 to casting roll, one use only
Artefact.Description: +D6 to casting roll, one use only. If Mushroom dice is an 1 then the spell is miscast

Artefact.Name: The Horn of Urgok
Artefact.SpecialRule: Bound item, Power Level 5: +1 Leadership for all friendly units, -1 Leadership for all enemy units
Artefact.Description: Bound item, Power Level 5. +1 Leadership for all friendly units, -1 Leadership for all enemy units. Roll a D6 after each use. On the roll of a 1, the bearer suffer a Strength 5 hit with no armour save allowed

Artefact.Name: The Pipes of Doom
Artefact.SpecialRule: Panic test for enemy cavalry, one use only
Artefact.Description: The pipes can be played at the start of the shooting phase. Each enemy cavalry unit, monster (ridden or unridden) and chariot within 24" must take a Panic test

Artefact.Name: Ironback Boar
Artefact.Description: Boar. When charging, this steed does D3 Strength 5 impact hits in addition to its norman attack

Artefact.Name: Warboss Imbad's iron gnashas
Artefact.Description: The character wearing the Gnashas gains the Killing Blow special ability in close combat. Chomp!

Artefact.Name: Bigged's Kickin' boots
Artefact.Description: Grants the wearer +1 Atack on his profile

Artefact.Name: Maad's map
Artefact.SpecialRule: Scout deploy by D6 roll
Artefact.Description: Before deploymnet begins roll a D6. On 2-6 the bearer of the map may be deployed as a scout. On a roll of a 1, he got lost and must be deployed as normal

Artefact.Name: Brimstone bauble
Artefact.SpecialRule: D6 Strength 6 hits when bearer is slain
Artefact.Description: When bearer is slain, all units (friend or foe) in base contact suffer D6 Strength 6 hits, distributed as for shooting

Artefact.Name: Nibbla's Titty ring
Artefact.SpecialRule: Bound spell 'Eadbutt Power Level 3
Artefact.Description: Bound spell 'Eadbutt Power Level 3. Roll a D6 after each use. On the roll of a 1, the bearer suffers a Strength 5 hit with no armour saves allowed

Artefact.Name: Mad Cap mushrooms
Artefact.SpecialRule: Fanatics may re-roll the number of Hits caused
Artefact.Description: Fanatics may re-roll the number of Hits caused

Artefact.Name: Guzzla's Battle Brew
Artefact.Description: The character with the brew is assumed to have 'bolstered' himself before battle - roll a dice and consult the following table to determine the effects upon the drinker:|1-2 - Subject to Stupidity for remainder of the game|3-4 - Hatred of all enemies for the remainder of the game|5-6 - Hatred of all enemies and Frenzy for the remainder of the game

Artefact.Name: Mork's Spirit-Totem
Artefact.SpecialRule: Adds a number of dispel dice equal rank bonus
Artefact.Description: This magical banner adds a number of dispel dice to the pool equal to the unit's rank bonus

Artefact.Name: Rowdy Grott's Big Red Raggedy Banner
Artefact.SpecialRule: All Goblins within 12" may re-roll Panic test
Artefact.Description: All Goblins within 12" of the banner may re-roll failed Panic test

Artefact.Name: Bad Moon on a stick
Artefact.Description: All Night Goblin in this unit are Stubborn

Artefact.Name: The Spider banner
Artefact.Description: All Goblin in the unit have poisoned attacks (shooting and combat)

Artefact.Name: Gork's WAAAGH! banner
Artefact.SpecialRule: D6" to charge move, only one use
Artefact.Description: The unit adds D6" to its charge move. Declare charges first and then roll

Artefact.Name: Nogg's banner of Buthery
Artefact.SpecialRule: +1 Attack, only one use
Artefact.Description: All model in the unit have +1 Attack in the turn the banner is used. In the case of mounted models, only the rider gets the bonus, not the mount

Hero.Name: Grom The Paunch
Hero.Description: Grom The Paunch of Misty Mountain

Hero.Name: Skarsnik
Hero.Description: Skarsnik. Warlord of the Eight Peaks

HandWeapon.Name: Skarsnik's Prodder
HandWeapon.SpecialRule: Bound spell Strength 5, hit Strength 6 with a range of 24"
